open-meteo.notes: Free, no API key required, global

noaa.notes: US only, no API key required, official NWS

openweathermap.notes: Free tier, global, requires API key (https://openweathermap.org/api)

weatherapi.notes: Free tier, global, requires API key (https://www.weatherapi.com/)

weatherbit.notes: Free tier, global, requires API key (https://www.weatherbit.io/api)

visualcrossing.notes: Free tier, global, requires API key (https://www.visualcrossing.com/weather-api)
